sentences.sentence: Objective:To study the effect of hypercholesterolemia on the function of aorta.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究血胆固醇持续增高对主动脉功能的影响。

sentences.sentence: It is called familial "hypercholesterolemia" and can play a role in 1 of 500 people.
